artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Gaeltarra Eireann; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Hand woven plain weave. Weft threads of natural and dark tan alternating. Warp is same. Hand woven plain weave. Weft and warp threads of red and rust alternate. Backed with acrylic latex, moth-proofed. Brambleberry

title: Donegal
